name: GraceFM
0:
”Alexa play Grace FM Radio”
”Alexa open Grace FM Radio”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grace f. m. radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: On the Grace-FM Alexa skill you will be able to listen to Contemporary christian music with a great variety of genres like Pop, Rock, Gospel, Holy Hip-Hop and more. You will also be able to listen to our live shows and interviews where we share live experiences and testimonies. Our focus and mission is to continue to spread the Good news of the Gospel. We discuss everything and anything St Augustine FL the christian way connecting with the community. We created this platform as a way to open a healthy relationship with our Lord Jesus Christ.
